sense.def:
To blend substances together
pomeni mešati različne snovi, da se spojijo v eno samo.

seg.quote: Blend the cornflour with a little cold water.
Next, blend the tomatoes, garlic, and cream to form a paste.

sense.def:
Kadar barve ali zvoki
blend
, se spojijo ali združijo v prijetno kombinacijo.

seg.quote: ...their voices blending marvellously as they sing in harmony.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
blends into the background
ali
blends in
, je po zunanjosti ali zvenu tako podobno ozadju, da tisto težko vidimo ali slišimo samostojno.

seg.quote: Tree snakes blend well into foliage.
